snippet: As Western powers prepare for talks on Iran’s nuclear program, an increasingly isolated Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu continues his push for stronger action.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu embarks on public-diplomacy campaign of his career to push for stronger action against Iran even as six major world powers convene to negotiate on the nuclear issue with Iran's new leadership; Netanyahu, who seems increasingly alone in his views, risks seeming frozen in the past amid a shifting geopolitical landscape.
lead_paragraph: As Western powers prepare for talks on Iran’s nuclear program, an increasingly isolated Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu continues his push for stronger action.

headline.main: Netanyahu Takes a Lonely Stance Denouncing Iran
headline.print_headline: Netanyahu Takes a Lonely Stance Denouncing Iran
